title: The JRE review of 1260 with Lennox Lewis & Russell Peters
description:
Joe's guest on today’s episode I’m reviewing was Lennox Lewis the former heavy weight champion of the world. He’s also joined by Lennox and Joe’s good friend and hilarious comedian Russell Peters. Their conversation gives a good insight into Lennox’s life after boxing and what it was like fighting all those incredible people.

Enjoy my review folks!

Please email me with any suggestions and questions for future Reviews:

Joeroganexperiencereview@gmail.com
